title: About me
body:
Why MageTech?

One of my first email addresses was randomly assigned as MagE01@companyThatNoLongerExists.com

Also, being a bit of sci-fi nerd I remember the Arthur C. Clarke quote ,"Any sufficiently advanced technology is indistinguishable from magic"...I may have been a bit full of myself in early years.

I never developed a portfolio or Git repo because I've been too busy writing code that makes money for companies. This updated website is an effort to change that, it was built with AI. Read the next post to learn more!

title: Built with AI
body:
Am I a good developer because I am lazy? Maybe. I’ve stayed gainfully employed through a couple of recessions so that says something I guess.

But I admit I have been feeling the heat from the AI revolution. So this website is an experiment in being as vibe codey as possible. I’ve been using Junie from IntelliJ and chatGPT (Cat, I farted for you French speakers).

I’ve posted the code at a Git repo.
